example.name: autogen1
example.text: the mere diversion of funds from other parts of the economy and from other forms of housing -LRB- such as low-income -RRB- to the single-family home market
example.arg: from other parts of the economy and from other forms of housing -LRB- such as low-income -RRB-

example.name: autogen2
example.text: Mr. Gorbachev badly needs a diversion from the serious economic problems and ethnic unrest he faces at home .
example.arg: from the serious economic problems and ethnic unrest he faces at home
